message: I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. Would you like to make an offer for it?
I appreciate the offer, Alice, but $9000 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with right now. Would you be willing to come down to $8500?
I understand you're looking to save some money, but I'm not willing to go as low as $8500. I'm willing to meet you halfway, though. Would you be interested in $9000?
